response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value for me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. However, I understand its true worth lies in finding the right owner who will appreciate and utilize it to its full potential.

Considering its immense value to you, I propose a transaction price of $1,200,000. This figure represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value to me and its perceived value to you, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial outcome.

Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations or if you would like to discuss further details. I am more than willing to accommodate reasonable terms that respect the importance of this product to both of us.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
